label: A4B2C_tI14_139_ce_e_a-001
title: K$_{2}$NiF$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
This is the parent compound of the simplest layered-perovskite Ruddlesden-Popper series (Wikipedia).  The series also includes the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C4_tI14_139_a_e_ce-001}{parent of the high-$T_{c}$ cuprates, (La,Ba)$_{2}$CuO$_{4}$}, but we keep that separate as it represents a new class of materials. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC2D2_tI14_139_e_a_c_e-001}{Sr$_{2}$CuO$_{2}$Cl$_{2}$} is the quaternary form of this structure.
